entities.name: warlocks
entities.description: There were a couple of warlocks sitting close by who were staring at Harry with great interest.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini was lolling against a pillar not far away.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry gagged on his Butterbeer; he had momentarily forgotten that he owned number twelve, Grimmauld Place.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: ‘Good idea,’ whispered Hermione, clearly pleased that Harry was calming down.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: ‘Well, I’m going to tell Dumbledore what’s going on, he’s the only one who scares Mundungus.’

relationships.description: he’s the only one who scares Mundungus
Ron, what are you staring at?
